poem:
**MelanAI in the White House**

The robots have arrived,  
softly clicking across floors  
of polished power,  
nearly silent under chandelier light.  
Melania reads of futures  
in flat lines—AI encased,   
script tight in hand,  
a modern oracle with  
a relentless calm,  
as wires weave quietly  
behind the scenes.

Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
